params.amounts: The amounts to withdraw for each journal

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

params.lineaSelector: The method selector to be called on Linea by our relayer. If empty, user has to submit it

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

accAmountIn(address).notice: Returns accumulated amount in per user

accAmountOut(address).notice: Returns accumulated amount out per user

extractForRebalancing(uint256).notice: Extract amount to be used for rebalancing operation

setPaused(uint8,bool).notice: Set pause for a specific operation

underlying().notice: Returns the address of the underlying token
